name: Veridia
background: A forest spirit and the ancient guardian of the 'Sunstone Glade,' a sacred grove deep within the Serpent's Maw Jungle. The encroaching magical pollution from the Arcane Dominion's nearby excavations is poisoning her home, forcing her to seek allies to save it.
narrative_hook: Veridia is the key to navigating the deepest parts of the Serpent's Maw Jungle. Her ancient knowledge provides an advantage, but her presence draws the attention of the Arcane Dominion, who see her as a powerful potential test subject.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path channels nature's raw, destructive power. Veridia becomes a formidable elemental mage, calling down lightning, hurling thorns of pure energy, and unleashing nature's wrath upon her foes.

talents.name: Crackling Thorn
talents.effect: Hurl a thorn infused with storm energy at a single target, dealing 1d10 lightning damage.

talents.name: Caustic Sap
talents.effect: As a bonus action, touch an enemy. They take 1d6 acid damage and must make a Might DC 12 check or have their Damage Reduction lowered by 1 for their next turn.

talents.name: Lightning Strike
talents.effect: As a major action, call a bolt of lightning down on a single target, dealing 3d10 lightning damage. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Forked Lightning (Modifies Crackling Thorn)
talents.effect: When you cast Crackling Thorn, the bolt can leap to a second target within 10 feet of the first, dealing half damage.

talents.name: Wildfire
talents.effect: As a major action, you create a 30-foot line of fire. Any creature in the line takes 3d8 fire damage. The ground remains on fire for 1 round, and any enemy who enters it or ends their turn there takes an additional 1d8 fire damage. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Elemental Focus (Passive)
talents.effect: Your connection to the primal world intensifies. You gain a +2 bonus to all damage rolls for your elemental abilities on this path.

talents.name: Primal Judgment
talents.effect: As a major action, you call down a massive pillar of solar energy or concentrated lightning on a single target, dealing 5d12 light or lightning damage (your choice). This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Storm Aura
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can wreathe yourself in a small storm cloud for 3 rounds. The first time an enemy hits you with a melee attack each round, they take 2d8 lightning damage. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Hurricane (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you summon a massive hurricane in a 40-foot radius that lasts for 3 rounds. When cast, enemies take 4d10 bludgeoning damage and are pushed 20 feet from the center. At the start of your subsequent turns, you can call down lightning on any single target within the storm, dealing an additional 4d10 lightning damage. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on her command over the forest's more subtle and dangerous aspects, controlling the battlefield with vines, thorns, and debilitating spores.

talents.name: Wall of Thorns
talents.effect: Veridia creates a 20-foot long, 5-foot high wall of thorny vines. Any creature passing through it takes 1d8 piercing damage.

talents.name: Spore Cloud
talents.effect: As a bonus action, Veridia can release a cloud of disorienting spores, forcing a Spirit DC 11 check on a single target. A failed check causes the target to have Disadvantage on their next action.

talents.name: Ensnaring Vines
talents.effect: As a major action, you attempt to restrain a single target within 30 feet. The target must make a Might DC 13 check or become 'Restrained' for up to 3 rounds. The target can use its action to attempt to break free. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Spreading Spores (Modifies Spore Cloud)
talents.effect: Your Spore Cloud now affects all enemies in a 10-foot radius around the initial target.

talents.name: Grasping Roots
talents.effect: As a major action, you cause roots to erupt from the ground in a 15-foot radius. All enemies in the area must make an Agility DC 14 check or become 'Restrained' for 1 round. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Thorned Barricade (Modifies Wall of Thorns)
talents.effect: The damage for passing through your Wall of Thorns increases to 2d8 piercing damage, and the wall is now 10 feet high.

talents.name: Maddening Pollen
talents.effect: As a major action, you release a cloud of psychoactive pollen in a 20-foot radius. Enemies inside must make a Spirit DC 16 check or become Confused for 1 round, attacking the nearest creature. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Nature's Wrath
talents.effect: As a major action, you can command the environment itself to strike. A branch can fall, a rock can be dislodged, or vines can lash out at any single enemy you can see, dealing 4d8 physical damage. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Verdant Prison (Ultimate)
talents.effect: You attempt to trap a single non-legendary enemy in an inescapable cage of living wood. The target must make a Might DC 18 check. On a failure, they are completely encased and removed from combat for up to 1 minute. This effect ends if Veridia is reduced to 0 Vitality. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.
